text: (O pravakta!) Varito ila anu: "Jibril patla virodhamunna prativadu i yatharthanni grahincali. Allah ajnatone atanu i khur'an nu ni hrdayampai avatarimpajesadu. Purvam vaccina anni divyagranthalanu idi dhrvikaristunnadi mariyu visvasince variki idi sanmaram cuputunnadi mariyu subhavartanu istunnadi
